title: Discard 2
description: A novel about three generations of an American family circa 1931 to 1965: their lives, loves, politics and more.Mark has two troublemakers in his life: a gangster who possibly could harm his young daughter and a rich jokester who still causes trouble with his family.A good read about American family life circa 1931 to 1965, if you like historical fiction, you will like this book.Paperback and Kindle Amazon
author: Lois  Charles
